property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Put to one side Nazgul of Dol Guldur and 2 Dungeons Jailors from the Dol Guldur set and remove the Dol Guldur Objective cards from play. Unless stated otherwise, proceed to the next Stage in numerical order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player must search the encounter deck and place the first location they find into the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: After defeating this stage, each player may choose to heal all wounds from all their heroes. If so, proceed to Stage 3. If all player choose not to heal, then proceed to Stage 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player must search the encounter deck and place the first orc they find into the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. After defeating this stage, the players must decide if they want to try to free the prisoners. If so, proceed to Stage 5. Otherwise, proceed to Stage 6.

property.name: Text
property.value: After defeating this stage, the players must decide if they want to try to free the prisoners. If so, proceed to Stage 5. If all players choose not to free the prisoners, proceed to Stage 6.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players cannot defeat this stge without at least one Clue, or whilst any Dungeon Jailor cards are in play. After defeating this stage, as a response each player may place one ally or attachment into play from his hand for free. Proceed to Stage 7.

property.name: Text
property.value: For every 2 players in the game, place one Dungeon Jailor into the staging area. Players cannot defeat this stage without at least one Clue, or whilst any Dungeon Jailor cards are in play. Proceed to Stage 7.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place the Nazgul of Dol Guldur into the staging area. players cannot defeat this stage without at least one Clue, or whilst any nazgul cards are in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Take out the Nazgul of Dol Guldur, Ungoliant's Spawn and Objective cards and set them to one side out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When 9 Progress tokens have been placed on this card, put Ungoliant's Spawn into play. Players cannot defeat this stage whilst Ungoliant's Spawn is in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place the Shadow Key into play and attach one encounter card to it for EACH player

property.name: Text
property.value: Players cannot place Progress tokens on this stage unless a Hero controls the Shadow Key

property.name: Text
property.value: You may now remove the Shadow Key from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When 6 Progres token have been placed on this card, put the Nazgul of Dol Guldur into play. Players cannot defeat this stage whilst the Nazgul of Dol Guldur is in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player searches the encounter deck and places the first Orc they find into the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player immediately chooses and engages 1 Orc. Players cannot defeat this stage while any Orc cards in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do not make any more engagement chechs whilst on this stage. Enemies already engaged with you remain engaged. You are niether allowed to engage nor be engaged by enemies unless you are already engaged with them.

card.name: The Veil of the Lonely Mountain

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player searches the encounter deck and places the first Orc they find into the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

alternate.name: The Veil of the Lonely Mountain

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player may immediately place 1 Elf from their hand into play for free and any Elf character may also heal 1 Wound. Each player immediately chooses and engages 1 Orc. Players cannot defeat this stage while any Orc cards are in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: SOLO PLAY: You may only choose ONE HERO (and thus one sphere deck) to perform this quest. Also, take out the Legolas Hero card (from the Tactics Sphere) and set it to one side out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: You only need to carry out the staging element of the Quest Phase every other turn after your first turn, for this stage only.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may place Legolas into play on your side. For this Adventure only, any resources he generates are treated as the same as your current sphere.

property.name: Text
property.value: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Orc card and place it into the staging area. You may not defeat this stage whilst this Orc is in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Take out 1 Hill Troll and the Chieftain Ufthak card and set them both to one side out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player searches the encounter deck for 1 Orc and places it into the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Players cannot defeat this stage while any Orc cards in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place Chieftan Ufthak into the staging area. Players cannot defeat this stage while Chieftan Ufthak is in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: The 1st player may immediately place 1 Ally from their hand into play. Place the Hill Troll you put to one side into the staging area. Players cannot defeat this stage while are Hill Troll cards are in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Take out th Nazgul of Dol Guldur, Ungoliant's Spawn and the Objective cards and set them to one side out of play. Then choose a hero and five that hero Gandalf's Map.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whe 5 Progress tokens have been placed on this card, put Ungoliant's Spawn into play. Players cannot defeat this stage whilst Ungoliant's Spawn is in play. If Ungoliant's Spawn is defeated, place it to one side out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Allies may no longer enter play or be put into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When 5 Progress tokens have been placed on this card, put Ungoliant's Spawn into play. Players cannot defeat this stage whilst Ungoliant's Spawn is in play. If Ungoliant's Spawn is defeated, place it to one side out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Allies or Attachments may no longer enter play or be put into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When 5 Progress tokens have been placed on this card, put Ungoliant's Spawn into play. Players cannot defeat this stage whilst Ungoliant's Spawn is in play. If Ungoliant's Spawn is defeated, shuffle it back into the encounter deck.
